message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1200000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Alice, your offer is a bit high for my budget. I'm very interested in this product, but I'm only able to go up to $800000 at this time. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to come down to $1000000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $1000000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $850000, but that's my absolute limit.  Let's see if we can make this work.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm starting to think that $1000000 is a more realistic price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $850000 and $1000000, so I'm going to counteroffer at $925000. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to go up to $900000, but that's truly my final offer.  If you're not able to accept that, I'll need to move on to another option.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm starting to think that you're getting close to the product's true value. I'm willing to meet you at $950000, but I'm not going to go any higher. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?
